articles.description: The Geneva-based WHO is leading a global initiative to develop safe and effective drugs, tests and vaccines to prevent, diagnose and treat COVID-19. The respiratory illness caused by the novel coronavirus has infected 4.19 million people around the world.

articles.description: United Kingdom's Prime Minister Johnson admitted that a vaccine or drug-based treatment is the only feasible long-term solution.
